bug.short_desc: Create Links to the Demos of the viewed class.

long_desc.thetext:
If the user takes a look at the API-Doc of a widget or a layout for example it could be interessting to see exactly this part in
action in a demo. So a link to the local or online demo would be nice to have.
Adding these links to the api manually is too much work so a generation of the links is needed. To realize that the demo needs to
know which classes he is demonstrating. Tags in the class comment could hold this information and look like this:
@attribute demo:qx.ui.toolbar.Toolbar
The implementation of such a tag reading system should be system wide so other tags can be added in the future for all classes in
the whole framework.
Long grown priorities normalized to P5 to increase a few of them afterwards.
